edu.wheaton.simulator.statistics

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wheaton.simulator.statistics.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstraction of a database which is represented by a Table, provided by the Guava libraries
    Author:
    akonwi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database()
      CONSTRUCTOR An editable database will be created and the immutable copy will be set to null and all get() requests will fail until the client calls the finalize() method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsEntity(EntityID id)
      Does the table have records for the given Entity?
      boolean containsStep(int step)
      Does the table have records at the given step?
      void finalize()
      Once the caller is finished adding Snapshots to the database, they are responsible for calling this method to initialize the ImmutableTable which will be publicly available via get methods
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<java.lang.Integer,EntitySnapshot> getAllSnapshotsOf(EntityID id)
      Get all the Snapshots of a specific GridEntity throughout the game returned in a map using the step number as the key and Snapshot as the value.
      int getSize()
      Get the number of values(Snapshots) in the table
      EntitySnapshot getSnapshot(EntityID id, int step)
      Get the EntitySnapshot with given id at given step
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<EntityID,EntitySnapshot> getSnapshotsAt(int step)
      Get all the Snapshots from a current step returned in a map using the EntityID as the key and Snapshot as the value.
      void putEntity(EntitySnapshot entity, int step) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database()
        CONSTRUCTOR An editable database will be created and the immutable copy will be set to null and all get() requests will fail until the client calls the finalize() method.

    • Method Detail

      • putEntity

        public void putEntity(EntitySnapshot entity,
             int step)

      • finalize

        public void finalize()
        Once the caller is finished adding Snapshots to the database, they are responsible for calling this method to initialize the ImmutableTable which will be publicly available via get methods
        Overrides:
        finalize in class java.lang.Object

      • getSnapshot

        public EntitySnapshot getSnapshot(EntityID id,
                         int step)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the EntitySnapshot with given id at given step
        Parameters:
        id - EntityID of gridEntity or row to query
        step - the turn in the game or column to query
        Returns:
        EntitySnapshot at given row(id) and column(step)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the database hasn't been finalized or if the query fails

      • getSnapshotsAt

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<EntityID,EntitySnapshot> getSnapshotsAt(int step)
        Get all the Snapshots from a current step returned in a map using the EntityID as the key and Snapshot as the value. Will be immutable in order to prevent altering the contents.
        Parameters:
        step - to query for
        Returns:
        an ImmutableMap

      • getAllSnapshotsOf

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<java.lang.Integer,EntitySnapshot> getAllSnapshotsOf(EntityID id)
        Get all the Snapshots of a specific GridEntity throughout the game returned in a map using the step number as the key and Snapshot as the value. Will be immutable in order to prevent altering the contents.
        Parameters:
        id - the EntityID of GridEntity to query for
        Returns:
        an ImmutableMap

      • containsEntity

        public boolean containsEntity(EntityID id)
        Does the table have records for the given Entity?
        Parameters:
        id - GridEntity to query for
        Returns:
        true or false depending on whether the table has a row for the given id

      • containsStep

        public boolean containsStep(int step)
        Does the table have records at the given step?
        Parameters:
        step - to query for
        Returns:
        true or false depending on whether the table has a column for the given step

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Get the number of values(Snapshots) in the table
        Returns:
        size of database
